```{r}
cat("## R training sessions  \n")

read_csv(here::here("data/KIND_training_sessions.csv")) |>
  filter(str_detect(`Platform / area`, "R")) |>
  filter(str_detect(Title, "lubridate|functions|janitor|possible")) |>
  select(Title) |>
  mutate(fn = paste0("[", Title, "](r_training/", snakecase::to_snake_case(Title), ".qmd)")) |>
  pull(fn) |>
  bullet_list()
```
